<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.21</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker color for given marker.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command is identical to [[markerColor]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getMarkerColor]] markerName </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]] - marker name </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]</value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>"MarkerOne" [[setMarkerColor]] "ColorBlack";
_color = [[getMarkerColor]] "MarkerOne"; <template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>// returns "ColorBlack"</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[setMarkerColor]], [[setMarkerColorLocal]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
